cc.page.404.title: Page Not Found
cc.page.main.mainContent.title: Cryptocurrency historical data calculator
cc.page.main.mainContent.step1Descriptio: Select the monthly investment amount, start date and end dater
cc.page.main.mainContent.step2Descriptio: Enter the title the coin you are interested in and select it
cc.page.main.mainContent.step3Descriptio: Allocate the monthly investment amount as a percentage for each coin
cc.page.main.baseDescription.firstDescri: Imagine that you started investing $100 monthly in DogeCoin in 2019. By May 2021 your capital would have grown to $500k.
cc.page.main.baseDescription.secondDescr: With our service, you can make your list of coins for investment and see how profitable this portfolio would be.
cc.page.main.baseDescription.thirdDescri: With this information, you can decide if you should invest in crypto in the future in the same way.
cc.page.main.baseDescription.tool.subtit: Our tool will help you calculate:
cc.page.main.baseDescription.tool.firstD: Profitability in $ and % for individual coins.
cc.page.main.baseDescription.tool.fourth: Starting, average and last price for each coin.
cc.page.login.loginForm.title: Log In
cc.page.login.loginForm.step2.descriptio: Enter code sent to your email
cc.page.code.title: An error has occurred
cc.page.calculateYieldForm.title: Calculation of profitability monthly investments in cryptocurrency
cc.page.calculateYieldForm.step1.descrip: Specify the monthly amount for investment, start and end date
cc.page.periodAndAmount.monthlyInput.err: Value must be an integer and be between 20 and 1000000.
cc.page.periodAndAmount.startDateInput.e: Date must be between 01/01/2013 and yesterday.
cc.page.periodAndAmount.endDateInput.fir: End date must be greater than start date.
cc.page.periodAndAmount.endDateInput.sec: End date must be less than or equal to today date.
